meanings.definition: To kick or strike with the foot.
meanings.sent1: He was booting the ball during the soccer game.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys booting the punching bag at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler was booting his toys around the room.
meanings.sent4: The angry player was booting the ground in frustration.
meanings.sent5: The cowboy was booting the door open in a hurry.

meanings.definition: To start up a computer by loading an operating system or program.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, he starts booting his computer for work.
meanings.sent2: The IT technician is booting the server to fix the issue.
meanings.sent3: The computer kept booting repeatedly, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: She felt like booting her computer into action with a magic spell.
meanings.sent5: The startup sound signaled the successful booting of the system.
